label: Party
comment: An organisation.  May be a supply chain actor, a certifier, a government agency.

datatypeProperties.comment: The industry categories for this organisations.  Recommend use of UNCPC as the category scheme.
An optional lsit of other registered identifiers for this organisations
the country in which this organisation is registered

referencedBy.comment: The organisation that is the isuer of this VC. Note that the "id" property MUST be a W3C DID.  Other identifiers such as tax registration numbers can be listed in the "otherIdentifiers" property.
